name: mecha robot planet
description:
There's not much to do. I left the enemies for the last, sorry.

The web version only shows the GUI when fullscreen, sorry.

Fullscreen does not work well, sorry.

CONTROLS

  • Move by moving away the cursor from the character.
  • Right Click / Space for jump.
  •  Left Click for attack.
  • R to restart.
  • Esc for quitting.
  • F1 to hide instructions.

INSTRUCTIONS

  • This is your stamina and your health.
  • Killing enemies gives back stamina.
  • Rings BOOST your jump and let you jump one more time.
  • Right now there are only 3 planets

I used this things:

  • Melee Weapon Trail (Asset Store)
  • Bitmap Drawing API (Asset Store)
  • Kenny - Crosshair Pack (Asset Store)
  • Explosion by Master484 (Open Game Art)
  • Magellan (Asset Store)
